item.title: The more specific the mobile advertisement, the higher its earnings
item.description:
Smaato, a mobile advertising company, has observed that the most successful advertising categories in China during the first quarter of the year were shopping, e-commerce, communication, and technology. These categories achieved high eCPMs (effective cost per mille), reaching up to US$0.30. When analyzing mobile real-time bidding (RTB) ad expenditures in China during the same period, entertainment (30%) and games (22%) were the top two categories. Ajitpal Pannu, Smaato’s Chief Strategy Officer, noted that both monetization and brand spending increased when essential parameters were shared globally with advertising partners...

item.title: Smaato emphasizes the importance of emerging markets in the mobile advertising industry
item.description:
Source: Smaato. Smaato, a platform that connects mobile publishers and app developers with advertisers in real-time, has published its Q3 2015 Global Trends in Mobile Programmatic Report. The report is based on data from billions of mobile ad impressions processed through Smaato’s exchange during that quarter. It reveals significant growth in the Asia Pacific region, particularly in Indonesia, where the market expanded by 84%. This highlights Indonesia as an emerging opportunity for both publishers and advertisers in the region...

item.description:
